articles.author: Daniel Kreps
articles.title: Arrest Made in Shooting Deaths of ‘American Idol’ Music Supervisor and Husband - Rolling Stone
articles.description: Los Angeles police have made an arrest in the shooting deaths of longtime 'American Idol' supervisor Robin Kaye and her husband Thomas Deluca.
articles.content:
Los Angeles police have made an arrest in the shooting deaths of longtimeAmerican Idolsupervisor Robin Kaye and her musician husband, Thomas Deluca.
The Los Angeles Police Department announced Tuesd… [+1764 chars]

articles.title: Kyle Schwarber’s 3 homers in All-Star Game’s first tiebreaking swing-off lift NL over AL - AP News
articles.description: Kyle Schwarber went 3 for 3 in the first All-Star Game home run swing-off to put the National League ahead 4-3 following a 6-6 tie in which the American League rallied from a six-run deficit. In baseball’s equivalent of soccer’s penalty-kicks shootout, the ga…
articles.content:
ATLANTA (AP) Kyle Schwarber was nervous.
He had played in Game 7 of the World Series, homered for the United States in the World Baseball Classic.
But he had never walked up to the plate in an All-… [+5044 chars]
